title: Enjoy AdGuard’s top-rated data privacy tools for 5 years for only $35
content:
Macworld

In the digital age, we all need to take data privacy and cybersecurity seriously. The easiest way to do that? By protecting your online safety with a VPN. Ahead of Black Friday, you can gift yourself or a loved one a five-year subscription to AdGuard VPN for only $34.97 (reg. $359) through December 3.

AdGuard goes beyond the call of typical VPNs. Yes, it’s a zero-logging data privacy tool that gives you access to more than 60 lightning-fast servers worldwide so you can hide your physical location and browse anonymously. But beyond that, AdGuard (4.6-star rated on the App Store!) also uses an advanced security protocol to guarantee a faster and safer VPN connection than competitors.

You can connect on up to ten devices at once and enjoy AdGuard’s unlimited data on almost any platform, whether it’s iOS, Android, or Google Chrome.

Gift yourself or a special someone a safer and more private online experience with a 5-Year Subscription to AdGuard VPN, now just $34.97 until December 3 at 11:59 p.m. Pacific. No coupon required!

 

AdGuard VPN: 5-Yr Subscription – $34.97
